Icons

Mnemonic uses Font Awesome iconsets to make certain
actionable elements more visually dominant.

Common Usage

Solid

Solid is a substyle of the Font Awesome icon family. It looks solid and filled.
All Solid Font Awesome icons use the .fas class before the assigned .fa-custom class of the icon.

        <i 
        class="fas fa-user"></i>
  • User
    .fa-user
  • Users
    .fa-users
  • Search
    .fa-search
  • Zoom In
    .fa-search-plus
  • Zoom Out
    .fa-search-minus
  • Location Marker
    .fa-map-marker-alt
  • Location Arrow
    .fa-location-arrow
  • Settings
    .fa-cog
  • Arrow Left
    .fa-chevron-left
  • Arrow Right
    .fa-chevron-right
  • Arrow Up
    .fa-chevron-up
  • Arrow Down
    .fa-chevron-down
  • Caret Up
    .fa-sort-up
  • Caret Down
    .fa-sort-down
  • Play
    .fa-play
  • Play Circle
    .fa-play-circle
  • Stop
    .fa-stop
  • Stop Circle
    .fa-stop-circle
  • Pause Circle
    .fa-pause-circle

Regular

Regular is a substyle of the Font Awesome icon family. It looks outlined and is not filled.
All Regular icons use the .far class before the assigned .fa-custom class of the icon.

        <i 
        class="far fa-user"></i>
  • User
    .fa-user
  • Play Circle
    .fa-play-circle
  • Stop Circle
    .fa-stop-circle
  • Pause Circle
    .fa-pause-circle

Brands

Brands consists of logos of brands that are commonly added to web templates.
All Brands icons use the .fab class before the assigned .fa-custom class of the icon.

        <i 
        class="fab fa-facebook"></i>
  • Facebook
    .fa-facebook-f
  • Facebook Circle
    .fa-facebook
  • Facebook Square
    .fa-facebook-square
  • Twitter
    .fa-twitter
  • Twitter Square
    .fa-twitter-square
  • Whatsapp
    .fa-whatsapp
  • Whatsapp Square
    .fa-whatsapp-square
  • Viber
    .fa-viber
  • YouTube
    .fa-youtube
  • YouTube Square
    .fa-youtube-square
  • PayPal
    .fa-paypal
  • PayPal Card
    .fa-cc-paypal
  • Visa
    .fa-cc-visa
  • Mastercard
    .fa-cc-mastercard
  • Apple Pay
    .fa-apple-pay
  • Apple
    .fa-apple
  • App Store Circle
    .fa-app-store
  • App Store Square
    .fa-app-store-ios
  • Google Play
    .fa-google-play
For the full list of icons, visit the Font Awesome Gallery
